data.title: Stopped here numerous times, fast service usually, staff of at least 4 always
data.text: Subway restaurant next to it and convenient stop next to freeway. Has gotten better and more modern lately. Quick stop and go. Clean for the most part, not a lot of panhandlers or others.

data.title: Always Really Busy
data.text: Fairly clean gas station.  I don't go here too often though because the line is always so long to get gas.

data.title: WORST AM PM ever!
data.text: This AM PM is only good for one thing, GAS. The restrooms are filthy and deplorable! The coffee is AWFUL and not fresh!. Staff is TOTALLY rude, to everyone! Their Slushie machine is not cleaned and tasted like mold! We have stopped there 3 times on different trips and now give it a miss. All 3 times we got bad service, bad food and watched major disputes with customers!! Hard to believe locals put up with this. Boycott this station until they clean it up!  Felt so bad the last two times we stopped, both times we saw just really awful treatment of Hispanic people.
